column1: Art Institute of Chicago////With our 1200+ reviews already
column2: it would be hard for me to add something unique
column3: but indeed that is how I would describe in one word this place. For any visitor to Chicago - I would recommend this as a "must visit" spot. Very majestic entrance
column4: tons of interesting art from all over
column6: two cafeterias inside for convenience plus a nice sit down dining just outside. Lovely gift shop. A little garden outside to enjoy during the warmer months. One should avail of the "FastPass" or the combined city card. Rated by many
column7: as one of the best museums in the world.
